name: Metanet Hunter CD (itch)
description:
That's right. A new Metanet Hunter has appeared. We're celebrating Metanet Hunter's 4 year anniversary with a brand new one.

Metanet Hunter CD is a recreation of Metanet Hunter: REMIX. By that, we mean that we've rebuilt the entire thing into something incredibly sweet. The physics are tighter than ever, the variety is a box o' chocolates, and we have a BRAND NEW soundtrack for you to rock out to. Pop your headphones on and grab a gamepad, this one's a blast.

The Mission

In the original Metanet Hunter, Kinzo had shut down the Chaos Core by smashing all the power sources, the Chaos Orbs. Once his mission was complete, he began to hibernate. Two years later, his body is discovered accidentally by a man named Dr. Kegan, on a field trip to the Ancient Shadow Realm. Dr. Kegan proceeds to convert the robot into Kinzo 2.0, now equipped with a new armoring system, and the ability to launch electrical shuriken named Taiden! Another year passes, and suddenly, a massive earthquake permeates the land! A mysterious man known as ROTH has been rebuilding the Chaos Core, and his ultimate plan arises: The Metanet Terminal! His goal is to launch the monstrosity and cause havoc across the land! With the help of the rogue cybernetics distributor IZUKA TEAM, they've sent more Chaos Orbs across the land, and some are even guarded by much bigger threats! It's your goal to do what you do best: Obliterate the Orbs, and Terminate the Terminal. Prevent the Metanet Terminal from reaching full power and destroying the lands!

The Features
  • 8 Primary Stages. Explore the grasslands, a dangerous desert, a tropical tower, and even a space base! There's more to unlock, but that's for you to discover!
  • Tons of costumes. Want to smash things as a Goat? You can do that. Want to dash through the levels at insane speeds? You can do that. Need options? We've got them, you've just gotta find 'em.
  • Secrets all across the board! Try looking around in the levels for goodies. You might find some stat upgrades, or some special Chaos Orbs to enter Cyberspace!
  • A Groovy Soundtrack! Once again, we have the classic SDACE handling the tunes!
  • NO DRM! We build our games without DRM for a reason. You bought it, you can do what you want with it. Mod it, burn it, hey, even eat it! Just don't resell it or something. That's no good!
The Verdict

Well, what are you waiting for? You've got nothing to lose, and everything to gain! It's fast-paced, frenetic, and it'll be sure to make you laugh AND cry. That's a game.

You'll even be seeing it come to other places, but I felt like giving itch.io first dibs would be the coolest! Get it while it's hot.
